SELECT DISTINCT ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT IFNULL(APPINFO.APP_ID, 0)) FROM APP_INFO APPINFO, SYS_ROLE_MANAGE WHERE APPINFO.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND (SYS_ROLE_MANAGE.APP_INFO_ID = APPINFO.APP_ID OR SYS_ROLE_MANAGE.APP_INFO_ID='ALL') AND SYS_ROLE_MANAGE.USER_ID = #userId# )AS systemNum, ( SELECT count(*) FROM APP_DU APPDU, APP_INFO APPINFO, SYS_ROLE_MANAGE WHERE APPINFO.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND (SYS_ROLE_MANAGE.APP_INFO_ID = APPINFO.APP_ID OR SYS_ROLE_MANAGE.APP_INFO_ID='ALL') AND SYS_ROLE_MANAGE.USER_ID = #userId# AND APPDU.DU_ID <> '' AND APPDU.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND APPINFO.APP_ID = APPDU.APP_ID
APPDU.APP_ID = #apptId#
APPDU.DU_ID = #apptADuId#
)AS deplUnitNum, COUNT(APPDU.SERVICE_ID)AS cloudServiceNum, SUM(IFNULL(CMVM.CPU, 0))AS cpuNum, SUM(IFNULL(CMVM.MEM, 0))AS memNum, COUNT(CMVM.ID)AS vmNum FROM SYS_ROLE_MANAGE M,APP_INFO INFO LEFT JOIN APP_DU APPDU ON APPDU.APP_ID = INFO.APP_ID AND APPDU.IS_ACTIVE='Y' LEFT JOIN CM_VM CMVM ON APPDU.DU_ID = CMVM.DU_ID AND APPDU.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' JOIN CM_DEVICE VMDEV ON CMVM.ID = VMDEV.ID AND VMDEV.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' LEFT JOIN RM_DATACENTER RMDATACENTER ON RMDATACENTER.ID = APPDU.DATACENTER_ID AND RMDATACENTER.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' LEFT JOIN CLOUD_SERVICE CLOUDSERVICE ON CLOUDSERVICE.SERVICE_ID = APPDU.SERVICE_ID AND CLOUDSERVICE.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' WHERE M.USER_ID=#userId# AND (M.APP_INFO_ID = INFO.APP_ID OR M.APP_INFO_ID='ALL') AND INFO.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y'
APPDU.APP_ID = #apptId#
APPDU.DU_ID = #apptADuId#
INFO.APP_ID = #apptACPId#

SELECT (CASE APP_STAT.SR_TYPE_MARK
WHEN #srTypeMark#
THEN 0 ELSE APP_STAT.CPU END) cpuNum, (CASE APP_STAT.SR_TYPE_MARK
WHEN #srTypeMark#
THEN 0 ELSE APP_STAT.MEM END) memNum, (CASE APP_STAT.SR_TYPE_MARK
WHEN #srTypeMark# THEN
0 ELSE APP_STAT.DISK END ) diskNum, APP_STAT.SR_TYPE_MARK typeMark, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(APP_STAT.CREATE_TIME, INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') AS createDateTime, APP_STAT.DEVICE_ID deviceId FROM APP_STAT LEFT JOIN APP_DU ON APP_DU.DU_ID = APP_STAT.DU_ID AND APP_DU.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' LEFT JOIN RM_DATACENTER RM_DC ON RM_DC.ID = APP_DU.DATACENTER_ID AND RM_DC.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' WHERE 1 = 1
APP_STAT.SR_STATUS_CODE = #srStatusCode# AND APP_STAT.CREATE_TIME >= #createTime# AND
RM_DC.ID = #rmDataCId#
APP_DU.APP_ID = #apptId#
APP_DU.DU_ID = #apptADuId#
ORDER BY APP_STAT.CREATE_TIME , APP_STAT.DEVICE_ID
